bonus: Learn a Common potion recipe or meal. If you know all potions or meal recipes in that tier you can craft one instead.
ADV on your next Brewing check.
Learn an Uncommon potion recipe or meal. If you know all potions or meal recipes in that tier you can craft one instead.
Learn a Rare potion recipe or meal. If you know all potions or meal recipes in that tier you can craft one instead.
Learn a Very Rare potion recipe or meal. If you know all potions or meal recipes in that tier you can craft one instead.
Immediately complete Brewing on a potion. No check is needed but all ingredients are required.
Learn a Legendary potion recipe or meal. If you know all potions or meal recipes in that tier you can craft one instead.
